annotations.description: ...and that's about all that's easy at the moment, but I thought I'd make it easier for you guys with this beautiful, easy summer drink created by SF Barman ...
annotations.title: Summertime And The Weather's Easy....

annotations.description: ...and that's about all that's easy at the moment, but I thought I'd make it easier for you guys with this beautiful, easy summer drink created by SF Barman ...
annotations.title: Summertime And The Weather's Easy....

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Limoncello
1oz (30ml) Creme de Mure
1oz (30ml) Lemon Juice
.5oz (15ml) Simple Syrup
10 Mint Leaves
2 Blackberries 
Blackberry Garnish

Muddle blackberries and mint and shake with everything else. 
Strain over crushed ice into rocks glass. 
Garnish with blackberries

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OiIYSSNHhQ8
title: Blackberry Press
